Create a fully specified MixPower scenario with the Poisson lme4 backend

Source: R/backend-lme4-poisson.R
mp_scenario_lme4_poisson.Rd

Create a fully specified MixPower scenario with the Poisson lme4 backend

mp_scenario_lme4_poisson(
  formula,
  design,
  assumptions,
  predictor = "condition",
  subject = "subject",
  outcome = "y",
  item = NULL,
  test_term = predictor,
  test_method = c("wald", "lrt"),
  null_formula = NULL
)

Arguments

formula

Model formula.

design

A mp_design object.

assumptions

A mp_assumptions object.

predictor

Predictor column name.

subject

Subject ID column name.

outcome

Outcome column name.

item

Optional item ID column name.

test_term

Optional explicit term to test. Defaults to predictor.

test_method

Inference method ("wald" or "lrt").

null_formula

Optional null model formula for "lrt" tests.

Value

An object of class mp_scenario.

Contents

Developed by Mixpower Alex Litovchenko.
